## Problem

What problem does this solve? What limitation does it address?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature or change you'd like.

## Example

Show an example of how the feature would work (JSON, code, etc).

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches did you consider?

## Additional Context

Any other context or references.
